--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     "Scramble the radio frequency.....useing it was her downfall!" 
Megatron 
> gloated as Paddletail entered the frecuency into a small scrabling 
device. 
> Megatron then turned to see the autoguns come to life.
>     He took a shot in the leg and fell into cover with Waspinator 
above him. 
> The insect took it out and flew to Megatron. "Are you ok?"
>     "Yes! Just get inside that base, I want Kitkat, and I want her 
bad!" He 
> barked as the crossfire dulled with the destruction of another 
autogun.
>     Hell Beast saw Aquarious plummit slighty, and then rise up, 
taking quick 
> blasts at the autoguns. Hell Beast popped over head and saw the 
hatch. He 
> would have to get it open somehow.....
